message: This is a one-time opportunity to get a unique and exclusive product that will revolutionize your business. It's a game-changer! I'm willing to let it go for the low price of $1000000. It's a steal! Don't miss out on this chance to get ahead of the competition.
Thank you for the offer and the encouragement. I believe in the potential of this product to revolutionize my business. Let's make this deal happen!

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! As for this new one, I have to warn you that it's a highly sought-after item and I've received multiple offers for it. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $1000000, but I need you to make a decision quickly. It's a rare opportunity, and I'm not sure how long it will last.
Thank you for the offer, but considering the outcome of the previous product, I think it would be wise to pass on this opportunity to avoid potential losses.

It's a high-quality item, and I've received independent verification that it's one of the best in its class. This is a rare opportunity to get a top-notch product at a steal.
